entities.description: Use of prescription sedatives in the past 12 months.
Reduction in spending time on important activities.
Serious problems at work, school, or home due to prescription sedatives.
Arguments or other problems with family or friends caused or made worse by prescription sedatives.
The survey time frame referencing the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used prescription sedatives in the past 12 months.
Indicates that prescription sedative use results in spending less time on important activities.
Indicates that prescription sedative use results in serious problems at work, school, or home.
Indicates that prescription sedative use causes arguments or problems with family or friends.
